General.Name: Jiangsu Zhongnan Construction Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Zhongnan Construction Group Co., Ltd. is involved in the real estate development and construction business in China and internationally. The company also engages in the civil engineering works; and development of residential properties, hotel management, general contracting, and construction and installation activities. In addition, it is involved in the building industrial structures, including rail transit, municipal roads and bridges, commerce, and infrastructure construction; and hotel operations. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Synnex International Plaza, Building A, Shanghai, China, 200335
